title: Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21 5G sees $295 refurb discount, SanDisk 1TB microSD card, more
content:
All of this weekend’s best deals are now up for grabs with a 1-day refurbished discount on Samsung Galaxy S21 leading the way. That’s alongside a 2022 low on SanDisk’s 1TB Ultra microSD card and Bose’s latest SoundLink Flex Bluetooth speaker at $129. Hit the jump for all that and more in the latest 9to5Toys Lunch Break.

more…

The post Deals: Samsung Galaxy S21 5G sees $295 refurb discount, SanDisk 1TB microSD card, more appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung Galaxy S21 refurb discount is live through the end of the day with $295 in savings attached, plus more.
